Condition_summary_1: The Proponent must install vegetation-enhanced armour stone walls on a 25 m section of the east bank (50 m²) and retrofit 10 parking lot catchbasins with shields along a 565 m section of the Moira River east bank.
Condition_summary_2: Monitoring of offsetting measures for two years post-construction, with annual reports by November 30.
Condition_summary_3: Prohibition on activities adversely impacting offsetting measures and requirement for access permissions.
Condition_summary_4: Authorization limitations, including compliance with other regulations and prohibition on deleterious substance deposits.
Offset_footprint_size: 50 m² vegetation-enhanced armour stone walls, 10 catchbasin shields over 565 m river section
